entry.title: 🎉 Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ⭐️

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount Information（Price：$0.99 → Free ）

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and allows you to play any video. FyTube has special features such as: playback with the screen locked, as well as other well-known features like: activating subtitles, changing playback speed, full-screen mode, rewinding… we also added search filters by upload date so you don’t miss a single video of the topics you love the most! SPECIAL FEATURES PLAYBACK WITH LOCKED SCREEN: This feature allows you to keep listening to the audio of your videos while your device’s screen is locked, ideal for listening to music or your favorite songs while driving, or when you just want to relax with the audio in the background. How to activate: Simply lock your device’s screen and you’ll see your player use Play, continuing to listen to the audio of your video without interruption :) Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES • Full-screen video playback with high-quality videos. • Easy-to-use interface, friendly design. • Fast forward and rewind your video whenever you want, never miss the most interesting parts. • Subtitle activation. • Change playback speed to your liking. • Search engine with smart filters by upload date: day, week, month, year, all. • In each video, you’ll find a related videos section to discover more interesting content. • Discover the latest videos and don’t miss the latest news from around the world. • Our app connects directly to YouTube, allowing you to find any video. • Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device. • VoiceOver available. • No user creation required. • We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your authorization, watch your favorite videos safely. • Interface available in 29 languages. • NO ADS INTERRUPTIONS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS. Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new ad-free, subscription-free video streaming experience. Minimum requirements: • iOS 13 or higher. • 3G connection or higher. Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Words related to our application: youtube, youtobe,youtube youtube music,youtube vanced,youtube ad blocker,no subscription, skip youtube ads, music without ad, music no ads, no ads, app youtube, youtube adblocker, without ads,without ads,block popups,ads remover,pop up blocker,ad-block,blocking ads,adblock for youtube,content blocker,ad blockers,ad blocking,ad blocker,been choice,adblocker,ad-blocker,ad block plus,adblock pro,ad free,block ads,adblock browser,Adblock,ad blocker plus,skip youtube,ads,youtube singing,sin anuncios,music without ad,free you tube red,youtube adblocker,ad skip,block ad,free youtube,video-ads,adblocker youtube,abblocker,stop ads If you have any questions on how to use FyTube, visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us, we’ll be happy to assist you, we answer all our emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube brand and logo are registered trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. © FyTube®.

Application Screenshot

entry.title: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 永久会员：$19.99 → $14.99

Application Description

这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。 小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。 时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。 有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。 而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。 生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路： - 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。 - 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。 - 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据 美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道： "如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。 我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。 我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。" 因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。 【生辰 App 会员服务说明】 1.会员包含几种订购类型 订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月 2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期 3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消 4.生辰App 会员协议 生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/ 5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策 生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/ 生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/
